text: Terry Lynn Nichols (born April 1, 1955) is a U.S. Army veteran who was convicted of being an accomplice of Timothy McVeigh, the man convicted of murder in the bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building (Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, April 19, 1995), which killed 168 people. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Michigan Category:American murderers Category:American prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:American terrorists Category:Arsonists Category:Carpenters Category:Criminals from Michigan
title: Terry Nichols
